song.title: My Pink Pony was a Male :(
song.info:
Once upon a time, in a land, there was a man. He had a pony. They were best friends. Until his [co-worker?] ???... secret of the pony. He said: My pink My pink My pink, my pink pony My pink pony was a male...
???... The man would never smile again. It was obvious that his life was destroyed forever. (*Neigh!*) My pink My pink My pink, my pink pony My pink pony was a male...
